field.name: _id
field.type: int(11) NOT NULL Primary Key auto_increment

xmlmeta.name: _fielddata
xmlmeta.dvals: select firstname,lastname from _users order by firstname,lastname,_id

xmldata.name: _pages
xmldata.js_min: function pageCalendarMonth(e,a){return cancelBubble(e),ajaxGet("/calendar","calendar",{_template:1,func:"_calendar",monthyear:a})}function pageCalendarEvent(e,a,t){return cancelBubble(e),ajaxGet("/calendar","centerpop",{_template:1,func:"_event",type:a,id:t}),!1}function pageCalendarDetail(e,a){cancelBubble(e);var t=getText(a);return centerpopDiv(t),!1}function pageFilterGroup(e,a){var t=a?"block":"none",n=GetElementsByAttribute("div","data-group",e);for(i=0;i<n.length;i++){var r=n[i].getAttribute("data-group");r==e&&(n[i].style.display=t)}}
xmldata.name: calendar
xmldata.title: Calendar
